title.creator: FROM THE CREATORS OF ACC TV AND PYRACEENGINEER
title.advertisement-text: When your mirrors are filled with the competition, and your team is depending on you to bring it home, the race should be your focus. ACC DRIVE provides every tool that you need to keep you immersed in the battle, and not off in the menus. It is a fully featured toolkit that gives you and your team the cutting edge needed to win races.

feature1.title: Race Engineer
feature1.subtitle: The most important data at hand
feature1.description: The Race Engineer helps you get the right fuel and PSI into your car by looking at your data. Basically like the Session Info Page but local-only
feature1.modalText: Introducing the Race Engineer, your personalized in-car data analyst dedicated to optimizing your racing performance. This cutting-edge feature is designed to fine-tune your vehicle's fuel and PSI settings based on real-time data analysis, providing you with a localized and instant advantage on the track Much like the Session Info Page, the Race Engineer delves into the intricacies of your car's performance, but with a distinct focus on fuel and PSI dynamics. By harnessing the power of data analytics, this feature interprets your car's behavior on the track, enabling you to make informed decisions tailored to your specific driving style and racing conditions. The Race Engineer operates exclusively within your vehicle, ensuring that adjustments are made seamlessly and in real-time. This localized functionality allows for a quick response to the ever-changing demands of the race, giving you a competitive edge without the need for external connectivity. Say goodbye to generic settings and hello to a personalized, data-driven approach to racing. The Race Engineer empowers you to optimize your fuel and PSI settings with precision, helping you unleash the full potential of your vehicle and dominate the track with confidence.

feature2.title: Telemetry
feature2.subtitle: Additional Info on your past sessions
feature2.description: Revel in detailed lap specifics such as time, top- and average-speed, with the additional bonus of TC/ABS intervention stats. Stay on top of your game with active assists and overall stint details showcasing your best lap
feature2.modalText: This is some very short text

feature3.subtitle: Sharing and recieving your best laps to help each other out
